程序包 cms.web.action.staff

类 CustomAccessDecisionManager

java.lang.Object
cms.web.action.staff.CustomAccessDecisionManager
所有已实现的接口:
org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
@Component public class CustomAccessDecisionManager extends Object implements org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
访问决策器，决定某个用户具有的角色，是否有足够的权限去访问某个资源
作者:
Gao

    • decide

      public void decide(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, Object resource, Collection<org.springframework.security.access.ConfigAttribute> configAttributes) throws org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException, org.springframework.security.authentication.InsufficientAuthenticationException
      决定是否有权限访问资源
      指定者:
      decide 在接口中 org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
      参数:
      authentication - 用户凭证
      resource - 资源 URL
      configAttributes - 资源 URL 所需要的权限
      抛出:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - 资源拒绝访问
      org.springframework.security.authentication.InsufficientAuthenticationException - 用户凭证不符

    • supports

      public boolean supports(org.springframework.security.access.ConfigAttribute attribute)
      指定者:
      supports 在接口中 org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager

    • supports

      public boolean supports(Class<?> clazz)
      是否支持 FilterInvocationSecurityMetadataSource 需要将这里的false改为true
      指定者:
      supports 在接口中 org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
